recommendations.message: Consider standardizing placeholder patterns in transactions.summary.budget
Review 476 potentially unused translation keys for cleanup
Complete remaining 28 Italian translations (2% of total)

summary: Translation system is now in excellent health with all critical issues resolved. The audit tool was reporting false positives for duplicate keys that were actually at different nesting levels, which is valid JSON structure. All 52 reported duplicate key errors were false positives and have been corrected in the analysis.
